articles.description: West Indies vs India 1st Test Day 1Highlights: Rohit Sharma and Yashasvi Jaiswal have given India a steady start. Earlier, R Ashwin picked up his 33rd five-wicket haul to bowl out West Indies for 150 in the final session of Day 1 of the first Test in Dominica.
articles.content: Hello and welcome to our live coverage of the first Test between India and West Indies.
